mapper.select: select cur_assay_master.patient_no, cur_assay_master.patient_name, cur_assay_master.assay_cause, cur_assay_master.item_name, pe_register_items.cure_no, pe_register_items.compose_item_no from cur_assay_master left join pe_register_items on assay_no = cure_no where cur_assay_master.patient_no = #{patientNo};
